testsuite.name: tests.TC_04_ApparelAndShoesPageTest
testsuite.system-out: Clicking on Login Link Entering valid emailId in Email textfield Entering valid password in Password textfield Clicking on Login button Clicking on apparelAndShoes menu Clicking on sort option Clicking on display option Clicking on view as dropdown Clicking on product Clicking on size dropdown price should be displayed Qty should be displayed Clicked on add to cart Clicked on shopping cart Clicked on checkbox Clicked on checkOut clicking on billing adrress dropdown entering 'FirstName' text Entering 'Lastname' text entering emailId Entering company dropdown select Country India dropdown Entering Country name Entering Address1 Entering Pincode Entering Mobile number clicking on continue button verifying shippingaddress page is displayed clicking on Shipping address dropdown select shipping method select ground click on continue
